entry.title: taikoxyz/taiko-mono
entry.summary:
A decentralized, Ethereum-equivalent ZK-Rollup. ğŸ¥

Taiko

A decentralized, Ethereum-equivalent ZK-Rollup.

Documentation

Documentation can be found on the website at taiko.xyz. There is also a README in each package, as well as comments in the source code.

Project structure

taiko-mono/
â”œâ”€â”€ CHANGELOG.md
â”œâ”€â”€ CONTRIBUTING.md
â”œâ”€â”€ LICENSE.md
â”œâ”€â”€ README.md
â”œâ”€â”€ packages
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ branding: Taiko branding materials.
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ bridge-ui: Taiko bridge frontend UI.
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ eventindexer: Event indexer.
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ fork-diff: Fork diff page (currently, for geth).
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ protocol: Taiko protocol and bridge smart contracts.
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ relayer: Bridge backend relayer in Go.
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ starter-dapp: Template for Taiko dapps.
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ status-page: Taiko protocol status page.
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ tokenomics: Taiko tokenomics simulations.
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ website: Main documentation website at https://taiko.xyz.
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ whitepaper: Whitepaper source files with automated publishing.
...

Issues

If you find a bug or have a feature request, please open an issue.

Contributing

Check out CONTRIBUTING.md for details on how to contribute.

Get help

Reach out to the community on Discord to get help.

Contributors âœ¨

Thanks goes to these wonderful people!
